item.title: Bandit
item.description: bandit Bandit0 bandit0@bandit$ ls readme bandit0@bandit$ cat readme boJ9jbbUNNfktd78OOpsqOltutMc3MY1 bandit0@bandit$ exit logout Connection to bandit.labs.overthewire.org closed. bandit1 bandit1@bandit.labs.overthewire.org -p 2220 -PubkeyAuthentication no bandit1@bandit$ ls - bandit1@bandit$ cat ./- CV1DtqXWVFXTvM2F0k09SHz0YwRINYA9 bandit1@bandit$ logout Connection to bandit.labs.overthewire.org closed. bandit2 bandit2@bandit.labs.overthewire.org -p 2220 -PubkeyAuthentication no This is a OverTheWire game server. More information on http://www.overthewire.org/wargames bandit2@bandit.labs.overthewire.orgs password: bandit2@bandit $ ls spaces in this filename bandit2@bandit $ cat spaces\ in\ this\ filename UmHadQclWmgdLOKQ3YNgjWxGoRMb5luK bandit2@bandit $ logout Connection to bandit.
